title: Chandraare Lyrics Amaran Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Chandhirarae sooriyare
natchathira naayagare
amaran kadhaya konja
arindhu vandhu sollungalen

veeramulla aambala
avan marava kula
manippulla..
avan marava kula
manippulla..

dhairiyam irundhuchunaa
samuththiramum kaal alavu
thunichal valarndhirundhaa
thoongalellaam nool alavu

edhiri illaiyinu
ezhudhi vachchaan yaettula
idhaya padikkavilla
avanum oru kannanae
avan kadala pola
kaththa pola
kaakka vandha saaminga

amara seerivandhaa
alaiyum kooda adangumey
kuththamulla oorula
avan suththamulla aalunga

avan mugatha paaththu
manasu pooththu
kodi sanam vazhthunga
